document_data.caption: A map showing the Way of the Dragon in western Cormyr.
document_data.name: Way of the Dragon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Way of the Dragon''' was western road in [[Cormyr]] connecting the capital of [[Suzail]] with other towns along Cormyr's western region bordering the [[Storm Horns]].
document_data.Description: Originating in Suzail, the Way of the Dragon passed north to reach the town of [[Waymoot]] in the [[King's Forest]] before connecting [[Espar]] and terminating at [[Tyrluk]] on the [[East Way]].
